EmailTemplate.name: RS Customer - 60% Disbursal
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Disbursal__c.Loan__c}'s Solar Loan funds have been disbursed

*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
BlueWave has disbursed 60% of your Solar Loan to {!Opportunity.Partner_tag2__c}.
In order to receive the additional 10% disbursement, they will need to upload a confirmation of interconnection. There is nothing that you need to do at this time, but please feel free to contact us with any concerns or questions at 844.786.4100.
Sincerely, BlueWave Customer Care customercare@bluewavesolar.com (844) 786 - 4100
